translator_notes: 「抚琴居」(Fuqinju, 'The Abode Where One Plays the Qin') is an online literary community dedicated to studying Dream of the Red Chamber
This title page establishes the scholarly nature of this edition as a collation (汇校) of multiple manuscript sources with preserved commentary
「脂砚斋」(Zhiyan Zhai) is the primary historical commentator whose annotations were found on several early manuscripts
research_notes: The 汇校本 format brings together variant readings and commentary from multiple manuscript traditions
This electronic edition was prepared for online distribution and scholarly reference
